## `r fa("calendar-alt", fill= "steelblue")` May 15th to 17th, 2019


This course will be focused on an introduction to COMMAND>, the basics concepts to build a compendia and practical sessions to work with COMMAND>.

<br>  

### What is [COMMAND>_](https://command.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#) ?

"[COMMAND>_](https://command.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#) is a web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases."
